com.ejuklakApp

Class IndexParsingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ejuklakApp.IndexParsingTool

  • public class IndexParsingTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to implements index parsing from a html file, get the h2 - h6 as an object with id and the text (content)
